0.1.name: wordpress/mj-quick-comments
0.1.description: With this plugin you can add quick comments feature to any post. Just put "echo mjqc_comment_form( get_the_ID() , 'Post quick comment' )" , where first parameter is the ID of a post (e.g. within the loop), and the second one is anchor of a link (when click on this link, a form shows to post a quick comment).
